column2:
"I see...
The Dark Falz that appeared ten years ago;
[Took form of a child]."

"If one person confirmed that,
there's a possibility that their
memory's wrong.
But, if other people says the same,
then we're not mistaken."

"It seems like Apprentice wasn't the only Dark Falz
that appeared ten years ago, "

"When Apprentice lost the
fight against 2nd Generation...
Double appeared."

"The loss of 2nd Generation,
and the battle with Apprentice had a huge impact on Xion."

"So, that's why everything about Apprentice was erased,
but Double wasn't...
Makes sense."

"However, the [Apprentice] Double created...
Was that the real copy?"

"Then... Who's the [Apprentice] that keeps appearing around
the mining base
as of present?"

"Ah, I knew I'd find you here <%me>.
It seems like Rogio has something to tell you."

"<%me>, can you sortie to
the Mining Base right now?"
"2. Did you find something?"

"It's only a prediction but,
Apprentice might show itself
in a few hours."

"Yes, it's not definite but,
Apprentice might appear
in a few hours."

"Rogio, can you send me
the analytical data that you have?"

"I see...
Not only the atmosphere, but the contents of the sand as well...
Indeed."

"It's been like this in Lillipa for a while
now, so I thought that maybe..."

"Haha, after all of the calculations,
It's not your typical enemy."

"<%me>, I'll confirm Rogio's prediction.
Can you sortie immediately?"
"Wait, I'll go too!"

"Oh no Matoi.
You have an inspection to attend to."

"Eeeh? Again?!
No way, I wanna go too!"
"Should I call Philia?"

"<%me>...
Take care okay.
I'll be cheering for you."

"I have a really bad feeling
if Matoi meets Apprentice...
Sorry about this but, I'm counting on you."
